channel.title: Java error
channel.description:
Hi am am trying to run my server and when i click runsserver it comes up with this [code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command operable program or batch file.[/code]
if it's the path ... or the class path can you please tell me step from step exactly what to do... i go my comp then i go error varaibles and idk what to do from there i put in class path and path but i dont no if its correct.. and im using the update java 6 update 7 so please help!!
